scripts.lint: npm run lint:app && npm run lint:src
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd app && npm install

releases.name: Version 0.13.0
releases.body:
Changes:

- Migrate to Vue 2
- Fix markdown sanitizer
- Watch file changes
- [more...](https://github.com/egoist/eme/compare/v0.12.0...v0.13.0)

releases.name: Version 0.12.0
releases.body:
- Fixed Vue 2 compat issue (editor does not refresh after tab closed)
- Hide `Reload` menu item

releases.name: Version 0.11.0
releases.body:
- Show spinner when exporting PDF
- Fixed an XSS issue in markdown
- Removed Presentation mode (will be back as a plugin in v1.0)
- Migrated to Vue 2

For Chinese users : [macOS](https://oh6z2a80n.qnssl.com/0.11.0/EME-macos-0.11.0.dmg) | [Linux(.deb)](https://oh6z2a80n.qnssl.com/0.11.0/EME_0.11.0_amd64.deb) | [windows](https://oh6z2a80n.qnssl.com/0.11.0/EME-windows-0.11.0.zip)

Others just simply click down below:

releases.name: Version 0.10.0
releases.body:
Features:
- Sync to GitHub Gists
- New `about` window for macOS

Bug fixes:
- Update styles in night mode
- Add more tips

releases.name: Version 0.9.0
releases.body:
![preview](http://ww4.sinaimg.cn/large/a15b4afegw1f840e246v8j211h0nfdng.jpg)

Feature:
- Night mode, shortcut: `ctrl/cmd+shift+n`
- Context menu
- Preference pane

Fixes:
- Temporarily remove `drag to resort tabs` feature
- Align issue in presentation mode https://github.com/egoist/eme/commit/315cb8842a9945d9944ce18c0f3ed18d6f5ec501
- Word count issue https://github.com/egoist/eme/commit/a08a26eb8bfa72ab8fde5485114cb250b82ace7f

releases.name: Version 0.8.0
releases.body:
![download count](https://img.shields.io/github/downloads/egoist/eme/v0.8.0/total.svg?style=flat-square)

**New Features:**
- Resize pane https://github.com/egoist/eme/commit/b06d0631be1d5b32e6cd77b822a28b12791138de
- CLI support (macOS) https://github.com/egoist/eme/commit/68231eb5173112159c137d059e2a5cac283ce6ba
- Presentation mode https://github.com/egoist/eme/commit/2ab2e6ad05c86950f6551e66d0582ec273d1da2d

**Fixes:**
- Fix pane width in editor mode and preview mode https://github.com/egoist/eme/commit/070d601f3276f781a4deca33d30a0c2b7db23c15
- Use soft tabs https://github.com/egoist/eme/commit/2e4fb600d467b431dcb10d0e818867fe6926387e

![2016-08-24 1 24 22](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/8784712/17919197/2620b1f8-69fe-11e6-9992-b69a5a45ded3.png)

releases.name: Version 0.7.0
releases.body:
**Executable for linux(.deb) is now available!**

Features:
- Check for updates in menu
- Add tooltip to footer buttons
- Rename file
- Drag tab to resort

Bug fixes:
- Vim dialog style tweaks
- Make closing tab event cancelable

[More details...](https://github.com/egoist/eme/compare/v0.6.0-beta.1...v0.7.0)

releases.name: Version 0.6.0 beta 1
releases.body:
- Style tweaks
- Use SVG instead of icon font, to make the first-load non-blocking
- Keep window state
- Show recently opened files
- Fix image render issue

releases.name: Version 0.5.2
releases.body:
Bug fixes:
- Fix path to github-markdown-css, related to an `export as PDF` error
- Refactor make-html helper

releases.name: Version 0.5.0
releases.body:
New feature:
- Export as PDF
- Build for Windows

releases.name: Version 0.4.0
releases.body:
**macOS prebuilt(pre-release) is now available**
- Change folder structure
- Add icons

releases.name: Version 0.3.0
releases.body:
- bug fixes
- tab style tweaks
- add writing modes
- add vim mode

releases.name: Version 0.2.0
releases.body:
Bug fixes:
- Press `x` only close window
- CMD+Q will quit app but still asking user for saving unsaved files.
